quest.name: Perfectly Delectable
journal: Debroye is in a state of despair.

Debroye has tasked you with crafting pinches of ascorbic additive.

※Minimum collectability rating for this delivery is 160. Delivering items with a rating of 340 or more will earn greater rewards.

You deliver the ascorbic additive to an ecstatic Debroye. The current incarnation of Mervynbread is a delectable success, and she insists that you be in attendance when the Forum is ready to make their evaluation.
objectives: Deliver pinches of ascorbic additive to Debroye.

dialogue.name: DEBROYE
dialogue.text: Oh, Forename...

dialogue.name: DEBROYE
dialogue.text: I've been trying and trying to make that ascorbic acid.

dialogue.name: DEBROYE
dialogue.text: I've done exactly as Jalvaaz instructed, followed his steps to the letter, but it all ends in failure.

dialogue.name: DEBROYE
dialogue.text: As embarrassing as it is to admit, I simply lack the expertise─the process requires a far more competent hand than mine.

dialogue.name: DEBROYE
dialogue.text: So, here I am at the last, asking for your help once more...

dialogue.name: DEBROYE
dialogue.text: Please, I need you to manufacture the additive that will perfect our perfect meal!

dialogue.name: SYSTEM
dialogue.text: The Studium Deliveries list for Debroye has been updated. To view the new list, speak with Debroye.

dialogue.name: DEBROYE
dialogue.text: All our Mervynbread needs is a viable ascorbic additive. I may have failed in that endeavor, but I have faith that you will succeed!

dialogue.name: DEBROYE
dialogue.text: Ascorbic acid created from plain old coconut milk... I understand the idea in practice, but as you saw, the process itself was beyond my abilities. Thank you, Forename.

dialogue.name: DEBROYE
dialogue.text: Incredible─it's practically glowing with goodness! With this added to our creation, I have every confidence that the bread will pass any test they care to subject it to!

dialogue.name: DEBROYE
dialogue.text: With your additive, well, added to the mix, I put a batch of Mervynbread into the oven to bake. It should be ready any moment now!

dialogue.name: DEBROYE
dialogue.text: This is it─the final, fluffy result of much trial and error.

dialogue.name: Q1
dialogue.text: What will you say?

dialogue.name: A1
dialogue.text: It looks delicious!

dialogue.name: A1
dialogue.text: It looks so...familiar.

dialogue.name: DEBROYE
dialogue.text: Well, have a bite!

dialogue.name: DEBROYE
dialogue.text: And? How does it taste?

dialogue.name: Q2
dialogue.text: What will you say?

dialogue.name: A2
dialogue.text: As amazing as it looks!

dialogue.name: A2
dialogue.text: Like streams of flavor, blending into a single river of ambrosial delight!

dialogue.name: DEBROYE
dialogue.text: Wonderful! And the texture...?

dialogue.name: Q3
dialogue.text: What will you say?

dialogue.name: A3
dialogue.text: It's like biting into a soft-baked cloud!

dialogue.name: A3
dialogue.text: It's like natural law has been suspended to create this one moment of unparalleled, puffy-crusted bliss!

dialogue.name: DEBROYE
dialogue.text: Fantastic! And last but not least, what did you think of the aroma?

dialogue.name: Q4
dialogue.text: What will you say?

dialogue.name: A4
dialogue.text: That luscious, savory smell is to die for!

dialogue.name: A4
dialogue.text: It's like a siren scent of savory temptation which no mortal stomach can resist!

dialogue.name: DEBROYE
dialogue.text: Exactly what I thought! All the disparate elements have come together so well...

dialogue.name: DEBROYE
dialogue.text: Flavor, texture, aroma─not to mention a perfect balance of nutrients.

dialogue.name: DEBROYE
dialogue.text: And I have you to thank for this delectable achievement!

dialogue.name: DEBROYE
dialogue.text: Yes, I believe this current incarnation of Mervynbread has a good chance of swaying the Forum in our favor. You are attending the evaluation, aren't you? In fact, I must insist upon it!

dialogue.name: SYSTEM
dialogue.text: Debroye is thrilled with your efforts. She now considers you a Consummate Baker!

dialogue.name: SYSTEM
dialogue.text: The next request will be available from Debroye upon reaching level 90 as an alchemist or culinarian.
